thread.title: A remarkable find in Paris!!!
thread.title_full: A remarkable find in Paris!!! - Review of Passy Eiffel Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: stephaniegC8630BB
title: A remarkable find in Paris!!!
text: Myself and my boyfriend thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Passy Eiffel Hotel. The staff were very welcoming and accommodating. As it was our first time in Paris and our anniversary our room was kindly upgraded much to our delight and surprise. The room was very spacious and very clean. We also had a view of the top of the Eiffel Tower. The room was also very quiet and we could not hear noise from the hall or any other bedrooms. I look forward to our return to Passy Eiffel Hotel in the future.
